const StepSettingsBar = (props) => { return(

Step Settings

    props.selectProgress(1)}>

    Delivery Window

    props.selectProgress(2)}>

    Schedule Days

    props.selectProgress(3)}>

    Assign to

    props.selectProgress(4)}>

    Approve Before Sending

    props.selectProgress(5)}>

    Unsubscribe Link

) } export default StepSettingsBar
